Parent.Name: Nicoventures Holdings Limited
Parent.Address: Registered office: Globe House, 1 Water Street, London WC2R 3LA

Design.Description: The E-PEN cartomiser (containing the formulation) is disposable, and is engineered to only be used in combination with the E-Pen battery component by virtue of a non-standard, specially designed connector component. The cartomiser formulations, E-CAP, will also be sold as a refill soft pack containing up to 3 cartomisers.
